title: Revenge, Volume 1
description: Jess moves to LA for her dream job as a music intern. On her first day, she bumps into Dylan busking on a street corner.  Dylan Wolf has a gritty voice. His eyes are soulful. His incredible body is to die for, tattoos and all.  When Dylan looks at Jess, she feels emotions she's never had before. He can be sweet, but his dark moods scare her. When he sings, the whole world falls away.  Jess and Dylan's meeting hasn't gone unnoticed. At her job, Jess is summoned to the mysterious ninth floor. Her new assignment is to get close to Dylan. By seducing him.  Jess is shocked. She's an innocent girl.  Selling her body would be immoral. It would be wrong.  But strange things are happening at the company. No matter which decision she makes, she might be in danger.  One thing is for sure: If she takes this assignment, Jess will never be the same.  REVENGE VOLUME 1 is 27,000 words or about 110 pages. REVENGE is a 5-part series. Each book is approximately the same length. Contains some MATURE content.
author: J.J.  Knight
